pages.name: /source
pages.desc: Sends the source code of the bot.

pages.name: /rank
pages.desc: Shows your (or another users) current level and XP.

pages.name: /top
pages.desc: Shows the top 10 users in the server by level.

pages.name: /warnings
pages.desc: Shows the warnings for a user.

pages.name: /purge
pages.desc: Delete a number of messages from the current channel.
